scripts.build:packages: npm --workspace packages/types run build && npm --workspace packages/auth-module run build && npm --workspace apps/api/config-module run build && npm --workspace packages/env run build
scripts.build:services: npm --workspace apps/api/api-gateway run build && npm --workspace apps/api/auth-service run build && npm --workspace apps/api/tasks-service run build && npm --workspace apps/api/notifications-service run build
scripts.build:all: npm run build:packages && npm run build:services
scripts.migrate:all:run: npm run migrate:auth:run && npm run migrate:tasks:run && npm run migrate:notifications:run
scripts.migrate:all:revert: npm run migrate:auth:revert && npm run migrate:tasks:revert && npm run migrate:notifications:revert
scripts.dev:docker: docker compose up postgres rabbitmq auth-service tasks-service notifications-service api-gateway
scripts.dev:docker:up: docker compose up -d postgres rabbitmq auth-service tasks-service notifications-service api-gateway
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker compose down && docker compose build && docker compose up -d
